text:
[Verse 1]
Stars are twinklin bright
Moon up in the night
Feel the cool breeze bite
Dreamin till the light

[Verse 2]
Oceans far and wide
Tides that never hide
Waves that gently slide
On this cosmic ride

[Chorus]
We belong to the night
In the sky oh so high
Feel the magic ignite
Stars are our lullaby

[Verse 3]
Planets round and round
In the dark we bound
Find what can't be found
In the stars profound

[Bridge]
Dancin through the space
Galaxies embrace
In this mystic place
Love in every trace

[Chorus]
We belong to the night
In the sky oh so high
Feel the magic ignite
Stars are our lullaby
title: The Night Sky
